holes.original_proof:
intro n
induction n with
| zero => simp [ha0, Int.emod_self]
| succ n ih =>
  have h₆ : a (n + 1) = f.eval (a n) := ha n
  rw [h₆]
  have h₇ : f.eval (a n) % a 1 = 0 :=
    by
    have h₈ : f.eval (a n) ≡ f.eval 0 [ZMOD a 1] :=
      by
      have h₉ : a n % a 1 = 0 := ih
      have h₁₀ : f.eval (a n) % a 1 = f.eval 0 % a 1 :=
        by
        have h₁₁ : f.eval (a n) ≡ f.eval 0 [ZMOD a 1] :=
          by
          have h₁₂ : a n ≡ 0 [ZMOD a 1] := by
            rw [Int.ModEq]
            exact h₉
          exact?
        rw [Int.ModEq] at h₁₁
        exact h₁₁
      exact h₁₀
    rw [Int.ModEq] at h₈
    have h₉ : f.eval 0 = a 1 := by
      have h₁₀ : a 1 = f.eval (a 0) := by simp [ha]
      rw [ha0] at h₁₀
      simp_all
    rw [h₉] at h₈
    omega
  omega
